mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( bor_idx, bor_del_flag, bor_state, bor_subject, bor_content, bor_parent_idx, bor_category ) VALUES ( #{borIdx}, #{borDelFlag}, #{borState}, #{borSubject}, #{borContent}, #{borParentIdx}, #{borCategory} )
mapper.select: SELECT bor_idx, bor_del_flag, bor_insert_date, bor_update_date, bor_delete_date, bor_state, bor_subject, bor_content, bor_parent_idx, bor_category FROM board WHERE bor_idx = #{borIdx}
SELECT bor_idx, bor_del_flag, bor_insert_date, bor_update_date, bor_delete_date, bor_state, bor_subject, bor_content, bor_parent_idx, bor_category FROM board WHERE bor_state = #{borState}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET bor_del_flag = #{bor_del_flag}, bor_insert_date = #{bor_insert_date}, bor_update_date = #{bor_update_date}, bor_delete_date = #{bor_delete_date}, bor_state = #{bor_state}, bor_subject = #{bor_subject}, bor_content = #{bor_content}, bor_parent_idx = #{bor_parent_idx}, bor_category = #{bor_category} WHERE bor_idx = #{borIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_log ( borl_idx, borl_del_flag, borl_insert_date, borl_update_date, borl_delete_date, borl_act, borl_user_idx, borl_referer_type, borl_referer_idx ) VALUES ( #{borlIdx}, #{borlDelFlag}, #{borlInsertDate}, #{borlUpdateDate}, #{borlDeleteDate}, #{borlAct}, #{borlUserIdx}, #{borlRefererType}, #{borlRefererIdx} )
mapper.select: SELECT borl_idx, borl_del_flag, borl_insert_date, borl_update_date, borl_delete_date, borl_act, borl_user_idx, borl_referer_type, borl_referer_idx FROM board_log WHERE borl_idx = #{borlIdx}

SELECT bor.bor_idx, bor.bor_del_flag, bor.bor_insert_date, bor.bor_update_date, bor.bor_delete_date, bor.bor_state, bor.bor_subject, bor.bor_content, bor.bor_parent_idx, bor.bor_category FROM board bor INNER JOIN board_log borl ON bor.bor_idx = borl.borl_referer_idx AND borl.borl_referer_type = 'board' WHERE bor.bor_idx = #{borIdx}

SELECT bor.bor_idx, bor.bor_del_flag, bor.bor_insert_date, bor.bor_update_date, bor.bor_delete_date, bor.bor_state, bor.bor_subject, bor.bor_content, bor.bor_parent_idx, bor.bor_category FROM board bor INNER JOIN board_log borl ON bor.bor_idx = borl.borl_referer_idx AND borl.borl_referer_type = 'board' WHERE bor.bor_state = #{borState}
